title: Bangs!

_88Function.description: Array of strings spread and then passed to `new Function()`.

___initial.description: The specified initial value of the CSS property.

___stability.description: Stability level of the entire CSS property, and any values thereof unless explicitly overridden.

___values.description: List of CSS values this CSS property supports.

___alt.description: Alternative CSS code, overridden by generated code and by 'use'.

___stability.description: Stability level of the CSS value. Overrides that of the property it belongs to.

___use.description: Overrides any generated CSS code for this value.

___summary.description: Summary of the CSS property. Used in documentation.

___inherited.description: Whether the CSS property is inherited through the cascade.

___non_media.description: Lists exceptions to supported media at-rules.

___generators.description: List of functions generating CSS values.

___name.description: Name of the generator function to be called.

___options.description: A set of possible auxiliary options when calling the generator function.

___transforms.description: Defines functions that transform a pure data value into a CSS_Value type.
